text: ABP Ananda (used to be Star Ananda) is a free to air Bengali news channel. It was based in Kolkata, West Bengal and owned by ABP Group. The channel was founded on 1 June 2005 as Star Ananda after tying between Star India and the ABP Group.Star News to be known as ABP News from tomorrow http://www.thehindubusinessline.com. Retrieved 5 August 2012 On 1 June 2012, the channel was renamed as ABP Ananda after the ABP Group gained full control of the organization. ==References== ==Other websites== * * ABP Ananda on YouTube Category:Kolkata Category:Television channels in India
title: ABP Ananda
